sys_ux_client_script.name: Launch Special Handling Notes

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_71194e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcba7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">12094a091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcb3a</macroponent><name>Launch Special Handling Notes</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "Special handling notes",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
   const {
    snHttp,
    modal,
    screen
} = helpers;

    var SHNOutput = api.data.get_special_handling_notes.output.data.GlideSHN_Query;
    var showModal = SHNOutput && SHNOutput.totalMsg > 0;

    if (api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed)    return;

    if (showModal && api.context.props.screen.isActive) {
        api.emit('RECORD#OPEN_MODAL', {
            "route": "shn",
            "fields": {
                "confs": SHNOutput,
                "table": api.context.props.table,
                "sysId": api.context.props.sysId
            },
            "ariaLabel": await helpers.translate("Special handling notes")
        });
        api.setState("specialHandlingNotesDisplayed", true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 17:20:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>71194e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcba7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch Special Handling Notes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_71194e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcba7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 17:20:48</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
